original_text: And I fell to the ground and heard a voice saying to me, ‘Saul, Saul, why are you persecuting me?’
korean_text: 내가 땅에 엎드러져 들으니 소리 있어 이르되 사울아 사울아 네가 왜 나를 박해하느냐 하시거늘

sentences.original_text: And I fell to the ground
and heard a voice saying to me
‘Saul, Saul, why are you persecuting me?’
